net.rtccloud.sdk

Class Rtcc

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.rtccloud.sdk.Rtcc

  • public final class Rtcc
extends Object
    Rtcc SDK interface. Any call to the Rtcc SDK starts from this class.

    Rtcc SDK for Android is an event-driven SDK, see EventBus to understand how RTCC events work.
    Note that you should register your listener class before initializing the Rtcc singleton.

    The RtccEngine singleton is initialized in the host application by using the initialize(String, Context) static method.
    Upon connection, a ConnectedEvent is fired.

    The singleton instance can be retreived at anytime after initialization with instance().
    If the initialization isn't complete or successful when instance() is called, null is returned.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(String appId,
              Context context)
        Creates a RtccEngine singleton Object. The initialization is asynchronous, a ConnectedEvent will be fired upon connection.
        Parameters:
        appId - The Rtcc APPlication IDentifier.
        context - The Context to use.
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if appId or context is null
        RtccPermissionRequiredException - if required Manifest.permissions are not requested in the AndroidManifest.xml file

      • instance

        public static RtccEngine instance()
        Returns:
        The RtccEngine singleton or null if the SDK was not initialized properly.

      • eventBus

        public static EventBus eventBus()
        Returns:
        The event bus for this application.

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
        Sets the current log level of the SDK.
        Parameters:
        logLevel - The new log level to set.

      • getEngineStatus

        public static RtccEngine.Status getEngineStatus()
        Returns:
        the current status of the RtccEngine.

      • ensureNativeLoad

        public static void ensureNativeLoad()
        Ensure that the native library is loaded.

      • getVersionSDK

        public static String getVersionSDK()
        Returns:
        the version of the Rtcc SDK.

      • getVersionFull

        public static String getVersionFull(Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - The Context to use.
        Returns:
        the full version name (SDK version + internal version + application version).
        Throws:
        RtccIllegalArgumentException - if context is null
